data.content: This lesson has comprehension and language activities based on two stories titled My Fish! No, My Fish! and Under My Bed..

• In this lesson, you will listen to two stories. You will try to understand the gist of the stories and the sequence of events in them.
  • You can talk about your family and friends in short simple sentences.
  • You will read simple stories to follow the sequence of events.
  • You can also write short sentences about your personal preferences.
